message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair and gives us both a good deal.
I understand you want a good deal Alice, but so do I.  How about we try something a little closer to the middle?
The clock is ticking, Bob.  This is a strong offer, and it favors you less with each passing round.
The clock is ticking for both of us Alice. I need to make this worthwhile. This seems like a fair compromise.
Don't be greedy Bob. Time is running out and this is the best you'll get.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice! I'm offering you a very reasonable deal here. Take it or leave it, but my offers won't get better.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. My offer is more than fair. Take it before your share shrinks even further!
